Discription: The Delhi Finance Minister, Kailash Gahlot, presented the budget for the year 2023-24, which is worth  ₹78,800 crore. This amount is almost two and a half times higher than the expenditure of  ₹30,940 crore in the year 2014-15.

headings: Adani Airports to bid for more airports in India, says CEO Arun Bansal
Discription: In the last round of airport privatisation by the government, Adani Airports won bids to operate six airports

headings: Prince Harry is at risk of being deported from US over visa issues
Discription: In March 2020, Prince Harry and his wife Meghan Markle relocated to the United States, just before the country's lockdown in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

headings: India hit by 10 earthquakes in first quarter of 2023

headings: Is Google's Bard chatbot trained on Gmail data? Company responds

headings: SC to constitute bench to hear Bilkis's plea challenging release of 11 convicts
